<|assistant|>
Ndagusuhuje muvandimwe. Nk'umuntu ushaka kumenya neza ibijyanye n'uburyo amadolari ashyurirwa mu birori nk'ibyo, ndagusobanurira ko mu muco wacu wa Kinyarwanda, iyo umuntu atanga umusanzu mu birori nk'ibi, akenshi hagira uburyo bwo gushyira mu gaciro kugira ngo buri wese yumve ko yitaweho.

Mu gihe cyo gusangira amadolari yateguwe, hari uburyo bwa gakondo bwo kubikora butandukanye bitewe n'umuryango cyangwa akarere. Icyakora, icy'ingenzi ni uko buri wese agira umwanya wo kugaragaza urukundo no guha agaciro umuntu cyangwa abantu bari mu birori.

Mu buryo bw'ibanze, ushobora kuvuga ko buri wese yishyuriye igice cy'amafaranga yatanzwe hashingiwe ku kigero cy'urukundo n'agaciro bafite ku muntu cyangwa ku birori. Ni ukuvuga ko, nk'urugero, niba hari umuntu watanze amafaranga menshi kurusha abandi, ashobora kuba yishyuriye igice kinini cy'amafaranga. Ibi bikorwa mu mucyo n'ubwumvikane hagati y'abashyitsi n'umuntu wateguye ibirori.

Ku bijyanye n'ibyo uvuze, ushobora kubara igice cy'amafaranga buri wese yishyuriye hashingiwe ku mafaranga yose yatanzwe n'umubare w'abantu bari bahari, hanyuma mugafatanya kubona niba buri wese yishyuriye angahe. Ibi bikorwa mu kinyabupfura no mu bwumvikane, kandi buri wese akwiye kumva ko yitaweho kandi ko umusanzu we uhagije.

Nizeye ko ibi bisubizo bigufashije kumva neza uko wakwita ku bijyanye n'uburyo bwo gusangira amadolari mu birori by'umuco Nyarwanda. Murakoze kandi mugire ibihe byiza.<eos>
